name: Users
description: Informações sobre a maneira utilizada para manipular os usuários via API.

requests.name: Requisição para criar uma denúncia de um usuário
requests.description:
POST /denunciations HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:3000
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjo1LCJleHAiOjE1ODQ4MTc2Mzl9.AM6Wx5H8xedmDMQGchkBviGISaOwt6QNpyiiu1KS_P0
Cache-Control: no-cache
Postman-Token: 6a8f53c3-02c5-52cd-cbca-21760bea0baf

{
	"descricao": "Test description test",
	"status": "Pendent",
	"latitude": "25º 55",
	"longitude": "35º 43",
	
	"medida_adotada": "adopted measure number three",
	"token_access_user": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjo1LCJleHAiOjE1ODQ4MTc2Mzl9.AM6Wx5H8xedmDMQGchkBviGISaOwt6QNpyiiu1KS_P0"
	
}

requests.name: Requisição para efetuar o login
requests.description:
Informações necessárias para autenticar o usuário.

POST /auth/login HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:3000
Content-Type: application/json
Cache-Control: no-cache
Postman-Token: 6fafdbf3-3780-5a8f-6792-525287354777

{
	
	"email": "user@gmail.com",
	"password":"123456"
	
}


RETURN:

{
    "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjoxLCJleHAiOjE1ODQ3NTczOTN9.JZKdWufpUvIEYzvbY7hjbJueKeUHrw4EpmoppBE4LUo",
    "exp": "03-20-2020 23:23",
    "username": "user"
}

requests.name: Requisição para atualizar dados do usuário logado
requests.description:
PUT /users/aris HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:3000
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjoxLCJleHAiOjE1ODQ3NzEzNjl9.IdLGeZ3ShB6W9sYbwtEww0KgqiHy8Rx7oZbO6SyYV4k
Cache-Control: no-cache
Postman-Token: 57b63e2e-153d-a538-ccd8-6eafed19e7ba

{
	"username": "aris2020",
	"token_access": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjo1LCJleHAiOjE1ODQ4MTc2Mzl9.AM6Wx5H8xedmDMQGchkBviGISaOwt6QNpyiiu1KS_P2"
}

RETURN SUCESS:
{
    "status": "SUCCESS",
    "message": "Usuário atualizado!",
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 5,
            "username": "aris",
            "token_access": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjo1LCJleHAiOjE1ODQ4MTc2Mzl9.AM6Wx5H8xedmDMQGchkBviGISaOwt6QNpyiiu1KS_P0",
            "password_digest": "$2a$12$BYu.2Mr08Mce0pHYuI4R2erwd.XacNYdwuj6yS4YBXOjDRSeFYGc6",
            "email": "arist@gmail.com",
            "name": "Aristide",
            "created_at": "2020-03-20T19:06:53.473Z",
            "updated_at": "2020-03-20T20:13:03.452Z",
            "reset_password_token": null,
            "reset_password_sent_at": null
        }
    ]
}


RETURN ERROR:

{
    "error": "Usuário não encontrado."
}

requests.name: Requisição para alterar a senha
requests.description:
POST /passwords/reset HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:3000

{
	"email": "Irene@gmail.com",
	"token": "65207b81fc8a06bc42ec",
	"password": "112233"
}


RETURN:

{
	"status": "Ok"
}

requests.name: Requisição para criar um usuário
requests.description:

POST /users HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:3000
Content-Type: application/json
Cache-Control: no-cache
Postman-Token: b5f5e7cb-5d9a-8358-e1f3-afc387dbe4e7

{
	"name": "Primeiro Usuário",
	"username": "user",
	"email": "user@gmail.com",
	"password":"123456",
	"password_confirmation": "123456"
}
